## üéØ What You Need to Know

### 1. Project Overview
- **Name**: Decentralized Autonomous Forum
- **Description**: Forum with gamification, BNB Chain rewards, community-driven moderation
- **Tech Stack**: Python 3.11+, FastAPI, Jinja2, PostgreSQL, Redis, BNB Chain
- **Timeline**: Day 4 of 365-day MVP plan (Target: October 2026)
- **Critical Requirement**: NO ADMIN PANEL (community-driven moderation only)

### 2. Previous Agents' Work
All 11 agents have completed their work successfully:

- ‚úÖ **Init**: Requirements gathered (450+ lines)
- ‚úÖ **Product**: Market research, product strategy, feature prioritization
- ‚úÖ **Plan**: 12-month roadmap, 24 risks identified
- ‚úÖ **UX**: 5 personas, 10 wireframes, accessibility compliant
- ‚úÖ **Design**: 18-table database, 65+ API endpoints, architecture designed
- ‚úÖ **Data**: Data pipeline, analytics, GDPR compliance
- ‚úÖ **Develop**: 50+ files, 3,500+ LOC backend, 100% frontend (8 templates, 2,819 CSS, 1,188 JS)
- ‚úÖ **DevOps**: uv environment, 105 packages, local config
- ‚úÖ **Security**: 92/100 score, all critical vulnerabilities fixed
- ‚úÖ **Compliance**: 95/100 score, Privacy Policy, Terms, Cookie Policy
- ‚úÖ **Test**: 100% pass rate (13/13 tests), requirement compliance verified

### 3. Critical Issues That Were Resolved
**Issue 1**: Security vulnerabilities (Rollback)
- 3 critical vulnerabilities found (hardcoded secrets, insecure sessions, missing HTTPS)
- **Resolution**: All fixed, security score improved from 72/100 to 92/100
- **Status**: ‚úÖ Resolved

**Issue 2**: Missing frontend (Rollback)
- Frontend templates/ and static/ directories were empty
- **Resolution**: All 13 frontend files completed (8 templates, 5 static assets)
- **Status**: ‚úÖ Resolved (verified 100% complete by Test Agent)

**Issue 3**: ADMIN level violation (Requirement)
- UserLevelEnum included ADMIN, violating "no admin panel" requirement
- **Resolution**: ADMIN removed, replaced with senior_moderator as highest level
- **Status**: ‚úÖ Resolved (requirement compliance verified)

**Issue 4**: Configuration bugs (4 bugs)
- IPFSSettings missing env_prefix, database pool config error, missing email-validator, OAuth too rigid
- **Resolution**: All 4 bugs fixed by Test Agent
- **Status**: ‚úÖ Resolved

### 4. No Outstanding Blockers
- ‚ùå No security vulnerabilities (all critical/high fixed)
- ‚ùå No compliance gaps (all regulations met)
- ‚ùå No test failures (100% pass rate)
- ‚ùå No frontend blockers (100% complete)
